metadata.title: CVE-2016-2065 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: sound/soc/msm/qdsp6v2/msm-audio-effects-q6-v2.c in the MSM QDSP6 audiodriver for the Linux kernel 3.x, as used in Qualcomm Innovation Center(QuIC) Android contributions for MSM devices and other products, allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds write and memorycorruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a craftedapplication that makes an ioctl call triggering incorrect use of aparameters pointer.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
linux-grouper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
